note.p: Birth: Providence Green, Green Hammerton, Yorkshire, England (04 April 1835)
Education: Apprenticed to Dr Anderson of York; York Hospital Medical College; St Bartholomew's Hospital, London. MD (1860, St Andrews)
Career: Assistant Physician (1863), later Physician (1974-1894), London Hospital; Assistant Physician (1863), later Physician (1867), National Hospital for the Epileptic and Paralyzed, London
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1911-1912 vol 84 pp xviii-xxv signed by D F
